name: TAL: Jungle
description: TAL: Jungle - In this game you need to help your hero go through a maze, avoiding traps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space
